No. 577. No. 578. No. 579. No. 580. No. 581. No. 585. No. 586. No. 587. Rickert Rice Mills, Inc., v. Fontenot; Dore v. Same; United Rice Milling Products Co., Inc., v. Same; Baton Rouge Rice Mill, Inc., v. Same; Simon v. Same; Levy Rice Milling Co., Inc., v. Same; Farmers Rice Milling Co., Inc., v. Same; and Noble-Trotter Rice Milling Co., Inc., v. Same.

Ante, p. 110.

January 20, 1936.

Motion of counsel for petitioners that mandate issue forthwith granted; order to release funds signed and entered.
